title: Missing skin reward?
body: In coming out of a game, I completed a series of missions, and one of them said I was to get 4 skins (I assume random) and there was an image of a treasure chest. I expected to find these in my loot, but there's nothing there. There were some popups with the images of the chest that I x'd through - did this delete them rather than put them somewhere to be collected later?

replies.body: They would have been automatically added into your collection, but it's going to be a little hard to figure out which ones are new just by looking there. Looks like you got Death Sworn Zed, Tyrant Swain, Dark Star Kha'Zix, and Super Galaxy Shyvana!

For anyone else that happened to miss what skins they got as rewards, these do show up in your "Purchase History". 

Go to the **Store** > Click the **Account** icon (next to **Purchase RP**) > Click **Purchase History** on the left.

The reward skins will show up as a non-refundable, 0 cost purchase.
Thanks - yes, reviewing purchase history shows me what was acquired which matches what Broporo highlighted.
how do I get that achievement?
Yeeee!!! I've had a few players mention that they couldn't see their skins there, but they should indeed show there as well!
how are you getting that mission?
